full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 192 of 262 1903 LC8VMAX6 Rodgers - cross 1 A. That's a rough. I'm not for sure about that. 2 Q. Okay. But that helicopter was also owned by a company, wasn't it? 3 A. Yes. 4 Q. That was owned by Air Ghislaine, Inc., isn't that right? 5 A. Correct. 6 Q. And I think Mr. Epstein bought another helicopter sometime later from Sikorsky; isn't that right? 7 A. Yes. 8 Q. And that aircraft or that helicopter was also owned by Air Ghislaine, right? 9 A. Yes. 10 Q. All right. Now, it's your understanding that all of these companies that owned these aircraft were controlled by Mr. Epstein, right? 11 MS. COMEY: Objection, your Honor. 12 A. Yes. 13 THE COURT: Just a moment. Just a moment. 14 MS. COMEY: Foundation and calls for hearsay. 15 THE COURT: I'll sustain on foundation. 16 Q. Let me ask you this, Mr. Rodgers: Before you were hired by Jeffrey Epstein, you worked for a company that sold airplanes; isn't that right? 17 A. No. 18 Q. No? You didn't work for Glimcher? Is that the name of the 19 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00019054
